name: The Lost Goblin Tower
description:
💎💎💎💎💎💎💎💎
The lost goblin tower is an exciting game from the first minute! The plot of the game about the hero from the futuristic future of Fantasy who has fallen into the world, is hostile to him. Once locked in a tower with magical lower earth spirits - goblins, he is desperately trying to survive ...

Rise to the very top, using a variety of weapons - to crush a large army of enemies. Search and open secret doors with nice bonuses. Let you and one in this unequal battle, but with you the hope and chance of our hero to return home.

- test in the style of the old school
- traps and evil goblins
- simple operation
- dynamic gameplay
- original soundtrack
